text: The district of Mendrisio is the southernmost district of canton of Ticino and of Switzerland. == Circles and municipalities == The district of Mendrisio has 27 municipalities divided in 5 circles (circoli): * Circle of Mendrisio: Mendrisio, Coldrerio, Genestrerio, Salorino; * Circle of Balerna: Balerna, Casima, Castel San Pietro, Monte, Chiasso, Pedrinate, Morbio Inferiore; * Circle of Caneggio: Caneggio, Cabbio, Vacallo, Sagno, Morbio Superiore, Bruzella, Muggio; * Circle of Stabio: Stabio, Novazzano, Ligornetto. Category:Mendrisio District
title: Mendrisio District
